lead_paragraph: MAYER--Margery (Voutsas), acclaimed opera singer with New York City and Chicago Opera Companies, died May 12, 2014 in Cupertino, California. She was 96. Survived by sons, Lynn Steen and wife, Mary of Northfield, Minnesota, and Richard Steen and wife, Robin Cameron of New York, New York, two granddaughters and six great-grandsons. Predeceased by husbands, Dietrich George Berthold, Sigvart J. Steen, and George Voutsas. Family requests memorials may be sent to the Margery Mayer and Sigvart Steen Music Awards at Wagner College, New York.
